name: Rapid Care OSHA First Aid Kit
description: A fully stocked kit ideal for OSHA compliance in small to medium workplaces.
target_audience_match: Perfect for facility managers who want to stay OSHA compliant without overcomplicating supply management.

name: 3M PPE Essentials Starter Kit
description: PPE kit featuring trusted 3M protection gear for general jobsite safety.
target_audience_match: Great for supervisors seeking dependable, brand-name PPE to protect their team with minimal guesswork.

name: First Aid Only 50-Person ANSI/OSHA Kit
description: Comprehensive first aid cabinet for medium-to-large teams.
target_audience_match: Ideal for safety officers at construction firms or warehouses managing teams of 25–50 workers.

name: Medique Personal Protection Kit
description: Individual PPE kits for personal issue or emergency prep.
target_audience_match: Perfect for distributing to remote teams, drivers, or high-contact workers who need grab-and-go PPE.

name: North by Honeywell Industrial First Aid Kit
description: Heavy-duty kit built for high-risk job sites like factories and plants.
target_audience_match: Suited for EHS managers needing rugged, high-capacity first aid stations in industrial environments.
